forum.service

Interface EmailService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmailServiceTLS

    public interface EmailService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void contactAdmin(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String content)
      Sends email from contact form to both admin and sender if valid email address provided
      void sendBanMail(java.lang.String to)
      Sends(in separate thread) email alert that forum user has been banned from using forum.

    • Method Detail

      • contactAdmin

        void contactAdmin(java.lang.String from,
                  java.lang.String content)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends email from contact form to both admin and sender if valid email address provided
        Parameters:
        from - forum user email address
        content - a message from user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - can throw an exception when some error occurs on sending

      • sendBanMail

        void sendBanMail(java.lang.String to)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends(in separate thread) email alert that forum user has been banned from using forum. Requires user having working email account.
        Parameters:
        to - forum user`s email address
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Will throw exception when there is some connection problem
